about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: We fight for the lives of those battling blood cancer.
about.text1: Our charity foundation supports patients with leukemia and other serious blood disorders by providing access to treatment, support, and hope.
about.text2: We cooperate with hospitals across Ukraine, ensuring transparency and community involvement in every step.
about.text3: Our team consists of doctors, volunteers, and people who believe in the power of kindness.

how.title: How We Work
how.subtitle: From donation to saved life — transparent and heartfelt every step of the way.

1.title: Donations
1.desc: We receive financial and resource contributions from caring people.

2.title: Purchasing Medicine
2.desc: Funds are used to buy necessary medicines and equipment with doctor approval.

3.title: Distribution
3.desc: Aid is delivered directly to hospitals that need it most.

4.title: Patient Support
4.desc: We provide emotional and material support to patients and families.

5.title: Transparency
5.desc: Every donor can see how funds are spent via public reports.

projects.title: Our Projects
projects.subtitle: Stories of hope and victory over disease

1.title: Drop of Life
1.desc: Blood transfusion program for leukemia patients. Helped over 150 patients receive necessary transfusions.

2.title: Ray of Hope
2.desc: Funding chemotherapy courses for children. Financed treatment for 85 young patients.

3.title: Stronger Together
3.desc: Awareness campaigns in schools and universities. Reached over 10,000 students.

4.title: Second Life
4.desc: Support for rehabilitation after bone marrow transplantation. Helped 40 patients.
